title: Interview with Dr. Vaughn Mancha, Epigenetics and the Bible, Lamark vs. Darwin
description:
This is a brief chat with Dr. Vaughn Mancha. He is a medical doctor and expert in the field of epigenetics, which he has been studying for decades and has read thousands of journal articles and papers on the subject. 

He has a Facebook group where he regularly posts information and can be found here 

https://m.facebook.com/groups/2805417109680219/?ref=group_browse

He also has a YouTube channel with some videos and playlists, and he has been featured giving presentations on other channels as well. 

https://youtu.be/IvKvD2U5A20

https://youtu.be/59GxS4tF8Sk

Dr. Mancha reached out to me after I shared a video about the spiritual implications of epigenetics. You can see that video here. 

Total depravity: epigenetic consequences of the fall

https://youtu.be/Aw2DfahtXkQ

Epigenetic Easter eggs, locusts and the Bene Gesserit breeding program

https://youtu.be/LP7YPBZcAGY
